resources.string: "this module add 'view in play' menu to the recent task long press popup menu, notification long press menu and app info screen. and an option enable two-finger tap the recent task thumbnail to go to the Play Store."
"the 'view in play' menu will show in the long press pupop menu in the recent task panel"
"enable this option will add a 'view in play' menu in the recent task long press popup menu"
"the 'view in play' menu will show in the app info screen"
"enable this option will add a 'view in play' button in the app info screen"
"use two fingers tap the recent task thumbnail in the recent task panel to go to the Play Store"
"enable this option will let you use two-finger-tap the recent task thumbnail to go to the Play Store"
"the 'view in play' menu will show in the long press pupop menu upon the notification"
"enable this option will add a 'view in play' menu in the notification long press popup menu"
Directly view in the Play Store
directly view in the Play Store, not show the app chooser screen
will show the app choose screen, let you to choose which app to handle the action
After change or upgrade, Please reboot your phone
Click to visit the XDA thread of ViewInPlay module
"the app icon from the launcher can not bring back, unless reinstall this app. find me in the Xposed Module list."
check to hide the icon from the launcher
only come from your launcher can toggle this checkboxxxxx
oh~ no Google Play Store??? if you sure you have it, please contact me :)
"Sorry~ this is stock app, can't show in the Play Store."
"Are you sure? once hide, can't bring it back unless reinstall the app for now"
